attributes.action: prevent shamed MPs from being given resettlement grants when they stand down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disgraceful state of affairs that MPs who have been caught abusing the expenses system will now be in line for a £30,000 resettlement grant. It is imperative that if the Prime Minister is to show any form of leadership on this issue, those who have chosen to stand down because of their impropriety should not be seen to benefit when they go.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
